    ESR 13 :: List of Publications

    1. Guindy, M., Barsi, A., Kara, P.A., Balogh, T., and Simon, A. 2021. Interaction methods for light field displays by means of a theater model environment. Holography: Advances and Modern Trends VII, SPIE, 109–118.
      • DOI: 10.1117/12.2589126
      • URL
    2. Guindy, M., Barsi, A., Kara, P.A., Balogh, T., and Simon, A. 2021. Realistic physical camera motion for light field visualization. Holography: Advances and Modern Trends VII, SPIE, 70–77.
      • DOI: 10.1117/12.2589128
      • URL
    3. Guindy, M., Barsi, A., Kara, P.A., Balogh, T., and Simon, A. 2021. On the simulation of hand-held cameras in light-field rendering. Holography: Advances and Modern Trends VII, SPIE, 119–124.
      • DOI: 10.1117/12.2589129
      • URL
    4. Balogh, T., Barsi, A., Kara, P.A., Guindy, M., Simon, A., and Nagy, Z. 2021. 3D light field LED wall. Digital Optical Technologies 2021, SPIE, 180–190.
      • DOI: https://doi.org/10.1117/12.2594276
      • URL
    5. Kara, P.A., Barsi, A., Tamboli, R.R., et al. 2021. Recommendations on the viewing distance of light field displays. Digital Optical Technologies 2021, SPIE, 166–179.
      • DOI: https://doi.org/10.1117/12.2594266
      • URL
